node.doctext:
NWesters includes noders from the region sometimes known as [Cascadia]. Although we are not necessarily a radical secessionist group, we also don't think it's a totally terrible idea.

NWesters like to play in the rain and take naps and mostly do normal human things. It helps lull the rest of the world into a false sense of security.

/msg [ideath] if you would like to be considered for membership. It doesn't cost much (considering the benefits) and hardly hurts at all.
node.title: NWesters
